snippet: The Iranian weight lifter Behdad Salimikordasiabi won gold with a 545-pound lift. Mark Cannella, a former United States coach, explains how he did it.
lead_paragraph: The Iranian weight lifter Behdad Salimikordasiabi won gold with a 545-pound lift. Mark Cannella, a former United States coach, explains how he did it.

headline.main: Lifting 545 Pounds Over His Head for Olympic Gold
